issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Ticket for tracking MR changes after YARN-717.
fields.summary: Update MR App to use Token directly after YARN-717

comments.body:
Attaching MR changes from YARN-717 on behalf of Jian.

Been reviewing this. Will commit this together with YARN-717.
Committed this to trunk and branch-2 together with YARN-717. Closing this.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3829 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3829/])
    YARN-717. Put object creation factories for Token in the class itself and remove useless derivations for specific tokens. Contributed by Jian He.
MAPREDUCE-5289. Updated MR App to use Token directly after YARN-717. Contributed by Jian He. (Revision 1488616)

     Result = SUCCESS
